subject: [Fwd: Re: [junit] accessing System.out program output from a junit	test]
msgSnippet: Silly me, I couldn t see a System.getOut() but of course I can just do:- PrintWriter orig = System.out; Best Rgds, Peter H. [Non-text portions of this message
messageBody:
Silly me,

I couldn't see a System.getOut() but of course I can just do:-

PrintWriter orig = System.out;

Best Rgds, Peter H.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
